title: Who are the best political cartoonists in the United States? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: One place you can look for award-winning political cartoonists is this list of the Pulitzer Prize winners in the Editorial Cartooning category. Might want to check out recent multiple winners Steve Breen (1998, 2009), Walt Handelsman (1997, 2007), David Horsey (1999, 2003), Mike Luckovich (1995, 2006), and Michael Ramirez (1994, 2008).
